backend/main.mo: Defines salon, booking, user profile types with maps for storage, includes access control and blob storage mixins, and seeds default Swiss salons if empty.
feature_evidence.json: Lists two feature requirements affecting AppV1.jsx, specifying full file overwrite and frontend‑only behavior with mock data.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for many frontend files describing UI behavior, components, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Sets Tailwind base layers and OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes with global styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Tiny wrapper that renders and exports AppV1.
frontend/src/AppV1.jsx: Large self‑contained frontend app managing all state locally via localStorage, with views for landing, client, and pro flows.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context and provider using AuthClient with login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables for light/dark mode, utility classes, and custom animation keyframes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, importing global styles and rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/auraGenerator.ts: Generates marketing-style text descriptions for salons based on category, type, tags, and city.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animation.
project_state.json: Describes project versioning, architectural reset notes, frontend design direction, and known issues.
